message.body: Hey love. I know we're not right around the corner or anything but if you guys aren't doing anything on Sunday Danielle and I are making a little thanksgiving part deux for some friends. If you're around would love to see you. If not it's no big deal. Take care.
Aw you're so sweet, thanks for thinking of us! I'll talk to my other half and let you know :) what time is it at?
No biggie. I just know some peeps didn't get to 'go home' or whatevs so we figured why not... Early evening I suppose.
Ok cool, I'll let ya know!
